name: The Best Homemade Salsa Recipe
description: How To Make Delicious Salsa: Secrets of making the Best Homemade Salsa Recipe! This restaurant style salsa recipe is loaded with flavor, has an amazing texture, and a secret ingredient.

video.name: The Best Homemade Salsa Recipe
video.description: We’re sharing our secrets for making The Best Homemade Salsa Recipe we’ve ever tried. Healthy, fresh, and easy to adjust!

recipeIngredient: 3  jalapenos, (stemmed and seeded (you can substitute 1-2 habanero or serrano peppers.))
15 ounces crushed San Marzano tomatoes ((1 can))
4.5 ounces diced green chiles, (mild, medium, or hot (1 can))

recipeInstructions.text: Place the fresh tomatoes, onion, garlic, peppers, cilantro, lime juice, 2 teaspoons cumin, 2 teaspoons sugar (if using), and salt in a food processor. Pulse until the contents are fine and well blended.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the fresh tomatoes, onion, garlic, peppers, cilantro, lime juice, 2 teaspoons cumin, 2 teaspoons sugar (if using), and salt in a food processor. Pulse until the contents are fine and well blended.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the crushed tomatoes and green chiles. Puree until mostly smooth. Taste, then add more cumin and sugar if desired. Refrigerate until ready to serve.
